characters.name: Barnaby
characters.description: A golden retriever puppy who is initially fearful of a thunderstorm but overcomes his fear to bravely rescue a small kitten from the storm.

characters.name: Lily
characters.description: Barnaby's loving human owner, a young girl who is initially oblivious to the kitten's plight but shows compassion and care for it once rescued.

characters.name: The Kitten
characters.description: A tiny, black and white kitten who is lost and terrified in the storm. It is saved by Barnaby and becomes his new friend.
